attributes.action: stop cuts and funding for The Army Cadets and all other Cadet Forces.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: please could you consider stopping the proposed £4 million pound cut in training funds for the army cadets and any other proposed cuts to the navy and air cadets. these three forces are extremely important to the full timed forces and provide the bulk of recruits for our services.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
